executiveSummary: Emma and Miles pitched their company, FinalStraw, on Shark Tank seeking $625,000 for 5% equity. The company offers a reusable, collapsible straw to address plastic pollution, with strong early sales through Kickstarter and pre-sales. Sharks expressed concerns over market adoption, valuation, and competition, resulting in no deal being finalized.
keyDecisions: No major decisions recorded; no Shark invested in FinalStraw during this episode.

actionItems.task: Continue fulfilling Kickstarter orders and manage pre-sales
Develop marketing and education campaigns to encourage consumer adoption
Monitor competition and consider pricing strategies for scalability

nextSteps: Emma and Miles will continue fulfilling Kickstarter orders, focus on growing their consumer base, and refine their business strategy to attract potential investors in the future.
